com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please
  • Enclosing interface:
    BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter

    public static class BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please
extends Object
    Small struct passed back from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent). Use static constructor methods to create an instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please acknowledge()
      Return this from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to acknowledge the discovery.
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please acknowledge(BleDeviceConfig config)
      Same as acknowledge() but allows you to pass a BleDeviceConfig instance to the BleDevice that's about to be created.
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please acknowledgeIf(boolean condition)
      Returns acknowledge() if the given condition holds true, ignore() otherwise.
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please acknowledgeIf(boolean condition, BleDeviceConfig config)
      Same as acknowledgeIf(boolean) but lets you pass a BleDeviceConfig as well.
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please ignore()
      Return this from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to say no to the discovery.
      static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please ignoreIf(boolean condition)
      Returns ignore() if the given condition holds true, acknowledge() otherwise.
      BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please thenStopAllScanning()
      Shorthand for calling both BleManager.stopScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter) and BleManager.stopPeriodicScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter).
      BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please thenStopPeriodicScan()
      Shorthand for calling BleManager.stopPeriodicScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter).
      BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please thenStopScan()
      Shorthand for calling BleManager.stopScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter).

        public BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please thenStopAllScanning()
        Shorthand for calling both BleManager.stopScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter) and BleManager.stopPeriodicScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter).

      • acknowledge

        public static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please acknowledge()
        Return this from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to acknowledge the discovery. BleManager.DiscoveryListener.onEvent(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManager.DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent) will be called presently with a newly created BleDevice.

        Same as acknowledge() but allows you to pass a BleDeviceConfig instance to the BleDevice that's about to be created.

        config -

      • ignore

        public static BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please ignore()
        Return this from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to say no to the discovery.
